description: Try our easy to follow Beef Burgundy Pies recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Beef Burgundy Pies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Divide mixture between 6 x 2-cup ovenproof dishes. Cover each with pastry, pressing edges to seal and trim off the excess. Cut a few steam holes in the top. Bake for 15 mins until golden brown. Serve.
